fields.name: 1!pl activity [username|uuid]
fields.value: Shows when a player was last on and where their last location was.

fields.name: 1!pl chistory [username|uuid]
fields.value: Lists why a player's status was changed and when.

fields.name: 1!pl location [username|uuid]
fields.value: Shows where a player is if they are visible on the map.

fields.name: 1!pl online [username|uuid]
fields.value: Shows if the specified player is online.
